scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, seated and wearing a blue robe and golden halo, holds the Christ Child. Three Magi, identified by their crowns, approach. One Magus, kneeling and dressed in red and ermine, offers a golden chalice. Another Magus, in green, also holds a chalice. The third Magus, in blue, stands and holds a chalice. Behind them, a simple thatched structure with visible wooden beams suggests a stable or humble dwelling. The background features a green, hilly landscape with trees and a woven fence. Rays of light emanate from a celestial orb above.
